abilities.name: Hulking Strength
abilities.details:
Duncan does not scale on attack speed, but his basic attack deals additional physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health) to all enemies in a straight line.

Additional attack speed will be converted to bonus physical power.

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.details:
Duncan bashes the enemies in a cone-shaped direction with his shield, dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power) to all enemies in the area.

Shield Bash also slightly knocks the enemies back and briefly slows them.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.details: Duncan tumbles to a target direction, gaining increased physical resistance and magic resistance for a duration.

abilities.name: Valiant Charge
abilities.details:
Duncan charges at a target enemy, pushing the target back along the way and dealing physical damage (scaling with physical power).

If the target is knocked onto a wall, Valiant Charge will stun the target for a short duration, dealing additional physical damage (scaling with physical power and maximum health).

abilities.name: Defensive Front
abilities.details:
Duncan holds up his shield and creates a giant wall that blocks all projectiles including ultimate, except turret blasts.

Duncan also gains increased movement speed and the ability to move through units.

However, he can only use Shield Bash and Valiant Charge during Defensive Front.

Shield Bash has a rectangle hit box instead of a cone, and Valiant Charge will push multiple enemies at once. Both abilities range are based on the wall's length.
